relation: Darrow5 - #63 Although the Kraken was stopped, there is one problem to deal with: No one can retaliate while the shield is active. Well, no PSI user, at least.

Darrow1 - #80 The long wait begins. As much as Giygas is the embodiment of evil, nothing could be worse for Ness than having to sit still for three whole minutes in real time. It may not seem like much, but with the game time to real world conversion, that's about 300 years.
Darrow2 - #62 The calm from Ness' call is short-lived as Jeff alerts him to another serious situation. Poor kid just can't catch a break, it seems.
Darrow3 - #28 With the Pencil Eraser in hand, the path to the yogurt dispenser is finally open. Oh, and Talah Rama is there, too, I guess.
Darrow1 - #81 The worst page ever? Just wait until the gardening story arc.
